entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
